fields.title: AGE
fields.question: Is the page older than x days?

fields.title: VOLUME
fields.question: Is the page targeting a keyword with meaningful search volume?

fields.title: PAGE SIZE
fields.question: Does the page have thin content?

fields.title: CONTENT FOCUS
fields.question: Is the page's content similar to other content on the site?

fields.title: ORGANIC TRAFFIC
fields.question: Does it generate a meaningful level of monthly organic traffic?

fields.title: TRAFFIC
fields.question: Does it generate a meaningful level of non-organic traffic?

fields.title: BACKLINKS
fields.question: Dos it have any external backlinks pointing to it?

fields.title: CONTENT DECAY
fields.question: At what percentage traffic decline in a 12 month period is content categorised as decaying?

fields.title: CLUSTERS
fields.question: Is the page content about a core cluster related to your business?
